column4: anyone care to take a stab and compare gentoo/ubuntu ppc
so far i really like ppc ubuntu
thanks
some glitches in ubuntu-PPC, but nothing tooo terrible.
such as ?

synaptic glitches when you open up "universal" packages : my bus speed isnt being read right, and from what ive noted, : any HFS+ hdd <apple native> reads a bit slow if mounted w. Music/media
that hfs could be problematic
do you dual boot ?
a buddy of mine told me Gentoo runs real good on his Powerbook : he was dualbooted w. OSX :
thnks.
yeah i don't think that i would dual boot. not a big osx fan really.
i find i like osx on a >1ghz cpu. anything less is questionable
my girl has a powerbook and i'd love to put linux on it but she uses it for her work and i don't want to make that harder for her.
but osx i don't like so much.
that sounds like a nice combo
